str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To journey in(to), I go in(to), enter, intervene. From eis and poreuomai; to enter.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From koilos; a cavity, i.e. the abdomen; by implication, the matrix; figuratively, the heart.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ek and poreuomai; to depart, be discharged, proceed, project.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Food of any kind. From the base of bibrosko; food, especially articles allowed or forbidden by the Jewish law.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To cleanse, make clean, literally, ceremonially, or spiritually, according to context. From katharos; to cleanse.
